name: Dark CDKeys by GexideL
description: Dark theme for CDKeys. Work in progress theme. This theme is updated once a week / when needed! If you find any imperfections please write below in discussion.
additional_info: 07. 05. 2019 - Release 1.03 Checkout fix. ---------- 19. 12. 2019 - Release 1.02 Christmas sale fix. ---------- 09. 11. 2019 - Release 1.01 Fix to pop-up. ---------- 08. 11. 2019 - Release 1.00 First release of Dark theme for CDKeys. Inlcudes full dark CDKeys browsing content and some account pages.
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://www.cdkeys.") {
/* ==UserStyle==
@name         Dark CDKeys by GexideL
@description  Dark theme for CDKeys
@author       GexideL

==/UserStyle== */

.recent-release-list-new .product-item-name,
.bestseller .extra_list_new .product-item-name,
.trending .extra_list_new .product-item-name,
.custom_category-wrapper .category-products .extra_list_new .product-item-name,
.toolbar select,
.block-layered-nav dd ol li,
.block-layered-nav dd ol li a,
.block-layered-nav .currently .block-subtitle,
.block-layered-nav .currently .label,
#price-disp #min-amount:after,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_content h1.title,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_count input,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product-nav ul li a,
.product_style h3,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_sidebar .languages_icons h3,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_sidebar .games_tag h3,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .game_details .game_content dd,
.std b, .std dl dt, .std dt, .std strong,
.yotpo .yotpo-review .yotpo-main .content-title, .yotpo .yotpo-comment .yotpo-main .content-title, .yotpo .yotpo-question .yotpo-main .content-title, .yotpo .yotpo-onsite-upload .yotpo-main .content-title,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_sidebar .games_tag .game_tag_items a,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_sidebar .games_tag .game_tag_items li,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_sidebar .games_tag .game_tag_items a:hover,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_sidebar .games_tag .game_tag_items li:hover,
.instant-search #facets .list-group li label,
.header-wrapper .header .top-nav ul li a,
.cart-wrapper .page-title h1,
.cart-wrapper .cart_body .item_name h3,
.cart-wrapper .cart_body .price,
.cart-wrapper .cart_body .cart_list .qty span,
.cart-wrapper .discount input,
.cart-wrapper .totals #shopping-cart-totals-table div,
.cart-wrapper .cart_body .cart_list .qty input,
.checkout-wrapper .checkout-details .page-title h1,
.checkout-wrapper .checkout-details #checkout-step-login h3,
.checkout-wrapper .cart_summary .totals div,
.checkout-wrapper .checkout-details #checkout-step-login .register-wrapper p,
.checkout-wrapper .payment-coupon-wrapper .discount h2,
.checkout-wrapper .payment-coupon-wrapper .input-text,
.checkout-wrapper .checkout-details ol .step-title h2,
.checkout-wrapper .checkout-details #checkout-step-login .login-wrapper p,
.account-create .login_section fieldset > span, .account-create .new_account_section fieldset > span,
.account-create .register_section fieldset > span, .account-login .login_section fieldset > span,
.account-login .new_account_section fieldset > span, .account-login .register_section fieldset > span,
.checkout-wrapper .checkout-details #checkout-step-login .login-wrapper .form-list li input,
.account-create h2.title,
.account-login h2.title,
.account-login .form-list,
.account-create .login_section input,
.account-create .new_account_section input,
.account-create .register_section input,
.account-login .login_section input,
.account-login .new_account_section input,
.account-login .register_section input,
.dashboard-wrapper .page-title h1,
.dashboard-wrapper .my-account .dashboard .account-part1 .email,
.dashboard-wrapper .my-account .dashboard .account-part1 .nickname,
#my-orders-table td,
.dashboard-wrapper .my-account .dashboard .box-account .box-head h2,
.block.block-cart,
.dashboard-wrapper .my-account .dashboard .box-account .box .box-content p,
.accordion-container .article-title:hover,
.accordion-container .article-title:active,
.accordion-container .content-entry.open .article-title,
.accordion-container .content-entry i,
.accordion-container .article-title:hover i:before,
.accordion-container .article-title:hover i:active,
.accordion-container .content-entry.open i,
.header-wrapper .header .search input#search,
.custom-select-panel,
.wrapper-logout .content-logout h1,
.extension-banner-title,
.paypal-reminder,
h2,
.price,
td.a-center,
.checkout-wrapper .checkout-details #checkout-review-table-wrapper table th,
.total-head,
.checkout-agreements .agree label,
.cms-page-view .page-title h1,
.cms-page-view .page-content .verification,
.success-wrapper .success-content-details h2,
.success-wrapper .success-content-details h4,
.success-wrapper .success-content-details p
{
    color:#fff !important;
}
.pager,
.sorter,
.breadcrumbs li > *,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_content .product_highlights_container .product_highlights span,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_count .product_status,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_count .decrement, .custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_count .increment,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_count .qty2,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .std li, .custom_product_details-wrapper .std p,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .std,
.yotpo .yotpo-review .yotpo-main .content-review,
.yotpo .yotpo-comment .yotpo-main .content-review,
.yotpo .yotpo-question .yotpo-main .content-review,
.yotpo .yotpo-onsite-upload .yotpo-main .content-review,
.checkout-wrapper .checkout-details #checkout-step-login .register-wrapper ul.ul li,
.account-create .login_section p,
.account-create .new_account_section p,
.account-create .register_section p,
.account-login .login_section p,
.account-login .new_account_section p,
.account-login .register_section p,
.dashboard-wrapper .block-content ul li:before,
.dashboard-wrapper .block-content ul li a,
.accordion-container .article-title,
.wrapper-logout .content-logout h4,
.extension-banner-content p,
h3,
.box-content,
.item-options
{
    color:#ccc;
}
.block-layered-nav .currently .value,
.yotpo .transparent-color-btn:hover span,
.yotpo .transparent-color-btn:hover i,
.attributes-list li>.attributes-list_name,
.cart-wrapper .cart_body p,
.cart-wrapper .discount h2,
.cart-wrapper .totals #shopping-cart-totals-table .total-head,
.cart-wrapper .totals #shopping-cart-totals-table div:last-child,
.checkout-wrapper .cart_summary .totals strong > .price, .checkout-wrapper .cart_summary .totals strong.total-head,
.checkout-wrapper .checkout-details #checkout-step-login .register-wrapper .form-list li.control label,
.checkout-wrapper .checkout-details ol .step-title span.number,
.dashboard-wrapper .block-content ul li a:hover,
.dashboard-wrapper .block-content ul li:hover::before
{
    color:#019ee9;
}
.wrapper,
.wrapper .wrapper-container,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_count input,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_sidebar .games_tag .game_tag_items a,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_sidebar .games_tag .game_tag_items li,
.cart-wrapper .discount input,
.cart-wrapper .cart_body .cart_list .qty input,
.cart-wrapper .cart_body .cart_list .qty span.increment:hover,
.cart-wrapper .cart_body .cart_list .qty span.decrement:hover,
.checkout-wrapper .payment-coupon-wrapper .input-text,
.checkout-wrapper .cart_gd,
.account-create .login_section input,
.account-create .new_account_section input,
.account-create .register_section input,
.account-login .login_section input,
.account-login .new_account_section input,
.account-login .register_section input,
.header-wrapper .header .search input#search,
div[style*="background-color: white;"],
.cms-page-view
{
    background-color:#1b1b1b !important;
}
.footer,
.block-layered-nav dd,
.block-layered-nav .currently,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_count,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product-nav ul,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .game_details .game_content,
.yotpo .yotpo-regular-box,
.instant-search #facets .list-group li,
.checkout-wrapper .checkout-details ol .step-title h2,
.dashboard-wrapper .block-content ul li a:hover,
#my-orders-table thead .first th,
.accordion-content,
.checkout-wrapper .checkout-details #checkout-review-table-wrapper table th,
.checkout-wrapper .checkout-details #checkout-review-table-wrapper table tfoot tr,
.cms-page-view .page-title
{
    background-color:#252525 !important;
}
.recent-release-list-new .product-item-name,
.bestseller .extra_list_new .product-item-name,
.trending .extra_list_new .product-item-name,
.footer .footer-bottom,
.catalog-category-view .product_trending>h2,
.custom_category-wrapper .category-products .extra_list_new .product-item-name,
.gen-direction-arrows1 a.next,
.gen-direction-arrows1 a.previous,
.pager .pages li a:not(.next):hover,
.pager .pages li a:not(.next):focus,
.toolbar select option,
.block-layered-nav dt,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_content,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product-nav ul li a,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_sidebar,
.ActivationAccordion,
.product-review,
.specialBox,
.product_attributes,
.attributes-list,
.instant-search #facets .list-group li.block-title,
.header-wrapper .header .top-nav ul li .dropdown-menu li.item,
.cart-wrapper .cart_body .cart_list,
.cart-wrapper .cart_summary .cart_content,
.cart-wrapper .discount,
.checkout-wrapper .checkout-details #checkout-step-login .register-wrapper,
.checkout-wrapper .checkout-details #checkout-step-login .register-wrapper .form-list li.control,
.checkout-wrapper .checkout-details ol .step-title span.number,
.checkout-wrapper .checkout-details #checkout-step-login .login-wrapper,
.dashboard-wrapper .block-account span,
.dashboard-wrapper .my-account .dashboard .box-account .box,
.accordion-container .article-title:hover,
.accordion-container .article-title:active,
.accordion-container .content-entry.open .article-title,
.custom-select-panel,
.is-open .custom-select-opener:after,
.extension-banner,
.wrapper .wrapper-container,
.cms-page-view .main,
.cms-page-view .header,
.cms-page-view .page-content
{
    background-color:#2b2b2b !important;
}
.footer .footer-bottom .social-count .count_tw,
.footer .footer-bottom .social-count .count_ig,
.extra_trust,
.cart-wrapper .cart_trustpilot
{
    background-color:#fff;
}
.wrapper,
.custom-select-panel,
.cms-page-view,
.cms-page-view .page-content
{
    background-image:none !important;
}
.extra_trust,
.newsletter-wrapper,
.footer .footer-bottom .social-count .count_tw,
.footer .footer-bottom .social-count .count_ig,
.catalog-category-view .product_trending,
.toolbar-bottom .toolbar,
.toolbar,
.toolbar select,
.block-layered-nav dd,
.block-layered-nav .currently,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_count input,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product-nav ul li.active,
.product_style h3,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_sidebar .languages_icons ul li,
.activationBox ol li:after,
.yotpo.yotpo-main-widget .yotpo-bottomline.yotpo-bottomline-3-boxes .yotpo-bottomline-box-2 .yotpo-star-distribution,
.yotpo .yotpo-modal-dialog .yotpo-bottomline.yotpo-bottomline-3-boxes .yotpo-bottomline-box-2 .yotpo-star-distribution,
.specialBox,
.product_attributes,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_sidebar .games_tag .game_tag_items a,
.custom_product_details-wrapper .product_new .product_sidebar .games_tag .game_tag_items li,
#facets .list-group,
.cart-wrapper .discount input,
.cart-wrapper .cart_body .cart_list .qty input,
.cart-wrapper .cart_body .cart_list .qty span.increment,
.cart-wrapper .cart_body .cart_list .qty span.decrement,
.checkout-wrapper .payment-coupon-wrapper .input-text,
.account-create .login_section input,
.account-create .new_account_section input,
.account-create .register_section input,
.account-login .login_section input,
.account-login .new_account_section input,
.account-login .register_section input,
#my-orders-table thead .first th,
.dashboard .box .box-title,
.accordion-container,
.accordion-container .article-title,
.header-wrapper .header .search input#search,
.checkout-wrapper .checkout-details #checkout-review-table-wrapper table th,
.checkout-wrapper .checkout-details #checkout-review-table-wrapper table tbody td,
.cms-page-view .page-title,
.cms-page-view .page-content
{
    border-color:#2b2b2b;
}
.reasons ol li:after
{
    border-color:#fff;
}
.gen-direction-arrows1 a.next
{
    background-position:-60px -60px;
}
.gen-direction-arrows1 a.previous
{
    background-position:-10px -60px;
}
.product_style_desc:after
{
    box-shadow:inset 0 -100px 90px -90px rgba(27,27,27);
    margin-left:-25px;
    margin-bottom:-5px
}
.pager .pages li
{
    margin:0 1px 0 1px;
}
.pager .pages li.ais-Pagination-item--nextPage span
{
    float:right;
}
/* Change the white to any color ;) */
input:-webkit-autofill
{
    -webkit-text-fill-color:#fff;
    background-color:transparent !important;
    transition:background-color 5000s ease-in-out 0s;
}
input.edge-autoSuggestFieldFilled
{
    color:#fff;
    background-color:transparent !important;
    transition:background-color 5000s ease-in-out 0s;
}
.accordion-content
{
    padding-top:15px;
}
.header-wrapper .header .search button#search_cta svg
{
    filter:invert(0.9);
}
.cms-page-view .logo img
{
    filter:invert(0.9) grayscale(1);
}
}
